SEARCH
Package Entities

Class SalesRepresentative

java.lang.Object
Entities.Entity
Entities.Hero
Entities.SalesRepresentative
public class SalesRepresentative extends Hero
Represents a specific type of Hero with unique characteristics. The SalesRepresentative is equipped with a "CEO Friendship" weapon and starts with specific potions and combat consumables.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • SalesRepresentative

      public SalesRepresentative(String name, int maxHp, int strenght, int gold)
      Constructs a new SalesRepresentative character with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the SalesRepresentative.
      maxHp - The maximum hit points (HP) the SalesRepresentative can keep.
      strenght - The value of strength attribute, it influences attack power.
      gold - The initial amount of gold the SalesRepresentative has.

  • Method Details

    • showDetails

      public void showDetails()
      Print to the console the details of the SalesRepresentative hero.
      Overrides:
      showDetails in class Hero

    • attack

      public boolean attack(Npc enemy)
      Executes the SalesRepresentative's attack strategy during combat. The enemy's attacks are decreased by 20% against the SalesRepresentative. The special instant attack can only be used once per combat.
      Specified by:
      attack in class Hero
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy that the SalesRepresentative is fighting against.
      Returns:
      true if the SalesRepresentative ends the fight with HP greater than 0; false otherwise.
